text: aur jab tum un logon ko dekho jo hamaaree aayaton mein behooda bahas kar rahe hain to un (ke paas) se tal jao yahaan tak ki vah log usake siva kisee aur baat mein bahas karane lagen aur agar (hamaara ye hukm) tumhen shaitaan bhula de to yaad aane ke baad zaalim logon ke saath haragiz na baithana
